code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";const BASE_API_URL="http://localhost:5000";const useFetch=endpoint=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const result=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_API_URL,"/").concat(endpoint));setData(result.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){setError(error);setLoading(false);}};fetchData();console.log(data);},[endpoint]);return{data,loading,error};};export default useFetch;
